sentences.sContent: EDI components will be a certain number of EDI unit with reticulation , forming strong water Chambers separated.
sentences.sContent_eng: EDI components will be a certain number of EDI unit with reticulation , forming strong water Chambers separated.
sentences.sCn: EDI组件中将一定数量的EDI单元间用网状物隔开，形成浓水室。

sentences.sContent: Whenever you see a chest film with long standing reticulation with a lower lobe and peripheral preference also think 'UIP'.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whenever you see a chest film with long standing reticulation with a lower lobe and peripheral preference also think 'UIP'.
sentences.sCn: 无论何时，你看到胸片上长期存在的网状影，并且多位于下叶和肺周边部，你应想到uip。

sentences.sContent: The high adsorptivity of sepiolite and reticulation of plant fiber can be utilized to produce filter paper with high adsorptivity.
sentences.sContent_eng: The high adsorptivity of sepiolite and reticulation of plant fiber can be utilized to produce filter paper with high adsorptivity.
sentences.sCn: 造纸工业可以利用海泡石的强吸附性和植物纤维的网状结构，生产具有吸附性的滤纸。

synos.tran: 网状，网状物；网目；网状组织

words.tran: 网状组织，网状质；网罟座（南天的星座）；[脊椎] 蜂巢胃
[组织] 网织红细胞；[组织] 网状细胞
